Great movie and good torrent overall. If the Display Aspect Ratio flag has been set to 16/9 though, it's been set wrong.

So I'd assume you've cropped two vertical lines ("the black bar" probably) out of the original 720x554 (since it's 1,85:1). That makes the correct resultant DAR

(718/720) * 1024  /  554
=~1,843:1
=~1021:554

The movie can be demuxed and remuxed (losslessly) to update the DAR flag to the correct value. There might be a tool for editing the flag straight away, too.
Also, I don't think there's any point in using MP3 when using the Matroska container. I'd recommend AAC instead. Sorry, I'm a bit compulsive :p
Actually, AAC would've let you conserve the 5.1 audio with a sub-192 kbps bitrate - and with good quality, thanks to its superiority in multichannel encoding.
Hmm, it's been cropped, but not completely. There's a vertical black bar on the right. Of course, it's only a rather trivial detail and the quality of the encode is excellent ;)
